name: Heart Light (Epic MegaJam 2017)
description:
MegaJam theme: "However vast the darkness, we must supply our own light"

You play as a ghost of a child, who died in a car accident. Death let you play their little game: if you find and fire up all the torches, you may or may not come back to life. And one more thing: in this game the only light source is you.
